system.availability: Space Marines Only. Blood Angels Relic. Innately Master Crafted. Used as part of a Ritual of Vision by a Blood Angel. Often filled with Scarlet Sacramental Wine. When imbibed grants +10 to WS, BS, and Skill Tests, as well as Unnatural Perception x2 for 1 Hour. May also cause visions of the future.
system.cost:
Excessive use has dire consequences.
Exclusive to the Blood Angels.
